name: Kidblock Maker
description:
You've been asking for it, now it's here: Create your own custom skins for Kidblock! Easily add clothes, shoes and hair to your skin. Then customize it with our pixel editor. Send your new skin directly to Kidblock, or save your skin to your Camera Roll to share with your friends.

Make sure you have Kidblock, our free game to load your custom skin. Kidblock also just updated to 8.3 to support Kidblock Maker please check for a Kidblock update before you share your skins!
